Name: Spacetime Simulation
BuffDesc: 1. A <color=#55D0F0>countdown</color> will start upon entering the stage. When the <color=#55D0F0>countdown reaches 0</color>, <color=#55D0F0>the stage will fail</color>. 2. After failure, the <color=#55D0F0>countdown will be reset</color> for you to challenge again.
EnvironmentDesc: Recommend for teams with over <color=#55D0F0>5000 BP</color>
<color=#55D0F0>Trial characters</color> will be provided. We recommend you to use them in <color=#55D0F0>Normal difficulty</color>.

Name: Recompiled Code
BuffDesc: 1. A <color=#55D0F0>countdown</color> will start upon entering the stage. When the <color=#55D0F0>countdown reaches 0</color>, <color=#55D0F0>the stage will fail</color>. 2. After failure, the <color=#55D0F0>countdown will be reset</color> for you to challenge again.
EnvironmentDesc: In this chapter, tactical <color=#55D0F0>bonus becomes more powerful</color> when there is <color=#55D0F0>more time remaining</color>.
Accumulate more time to get higher tactical bonuses.

Name: Overclock Acceleration
BuffDesc: 1. A <color=#55D0F0>countdown</color> will start upon entering the stage. When the <color=#55D0F0>countdown reaches 0</color>, <color=#55D0F0>the stage will fail</color>. 2. After failure, the <color=#55D0F0>countdown will be reset</color> for you to challenge again.
EnvironmentDesc: In this chapter: Tactics will <color=#FF0000>accelerate the time</color> and provide <color=#55D0F0>more powerful buffs</color>.
Focus on a single type of buffs to maximize the tactical bonuses.

Name: Data Contamination
BuffDesc: 1. A <color=#55D0F0>countdown</color> will start upon entering the stage. When the <color=#55D0F0>countdown reaches 0</color>, <color=#55D0F0>the stage will fail</color>. 2. After failure, the <color=#55D0F0>countdown will be reset</color> for you to challenge again.
EnvironmentDesc: In this chapter, <color=#55D0F0>different actions</color> will <color=#55D0F0>change the time in different ways</color>.
Choose the appropriate type of tactics based on the characters' features.

Name: Computation Overload
BuffDesc: 1. A <color=#55D0F0>countdown</color> will start upon entering the stage. When the <color=#55D0F0>countdown reaches 0</color>, <color=#55D0F0>the stage will fail</color>. 2. After failure, the <color=#55D0F0>countdown will be reset</color> for you to challenge again.
EnvironmentDesc: In this chapter, tactical <color=#55D0F0>bonus becomes more powerful</color> when there is <color=#FF0000>less time remaining</color>.
Take advantage of the mechanism and plan the remaining time for optimal bonuses.

Name: Chaotic Spacetime
BuffDesc: 1. A <color=#55D0F0>countdown</color> will start upon entering the stage. When the <color=#55D0F0>countdown reaches 0</color>, <color=#55D0F0>the stage will fail</color>. 2. After failure, the <color=#55D0F0>countdown will be reset</color> for you to challenge again.
EnvironmentDesc: In this chapter, all the tactics will <color=#55D0F0>appear in a mixed way</color>.
Select a particular type of buffs and make your build around it.
